text: It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Cyberpunk 2077, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the ASUS N550JX-DS71T 15.6" IPS 4th Generation Intel Core i7 4720HQ (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950M 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 8.1 64-Bit Laptop. The port selection is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 950 is good, but I expected a bit more from the trackpad on the ASUS N550JX-DS71T 15.6" IPS 4th Generation Intel Core i7 4720HQ (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950M 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 8.1 64-Bit Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Had several issues with the ASUS N550JX-DS71T 15.6" IPS 4th Generation Intel Core i7 4720HQ (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950M 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 8.1 64-Bit Laptop since day one. overheats and the build material feels cheap. Performance in streaming games is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 950. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The port selection is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS N550JX-DS71T 15.6" IPS 4th Generation Intel Core i7 4720HQ (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950M 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 8.1 64-Bit Laptop!

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 950 is good, but I expected a bit more from the speakers on the ASUS N550JX-DS71T 15.6" IPS 4th Generation Intel Core i7 4720HQ (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950M 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 8.1 64-Bit Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.
